title: Nineteenth century letters,
author: Rees, Byron Johnson
snippet: 2 Chester Square, December 17, 1860. ... I have at last got the Commissioner's distinct leave to publish my Report, with additions, as a book.

title: The life of Joseph Hodges Choate as gathered chiefly from his letters,
author: Choate, Joseph Hodges
snippet: "To begin at the point where you left me. I went 'round to St. Michael's Church in Chester Square and heard my old friend Bishop Whipple preach a most animated  discourse on Indians and such to a very crowded audience. His pretty young wife was with him, and 34 and 74 seem to get along well together.
